data.title: Legal notice Instagram prize draw 5,000 followers
data.meta_description: Legal notice Instagram prize draw 5,000 followers, Blau Hotels
data.text:
1. ORGANISING COMPANY FOR THIS PROMOTION

The company ROXA HOSPITALITY S.L. trading under the brand of BLAU HOTELS with registered office at C/ Manuel Azaña nº 38, 07006 Palma (Balearic Islands) and identification number B07004880 is organising this prize draw (hereinafter, "the Promotion"), to be carried out online, specifically on the Instagram platform, in accordance with the provisions of the section, and participation requirements.

2. PARTICIPATION REQUIREMENTS AND DETAILS OF THE PROMOTION

The participation requirements are as follows:

Persons residing in any country and over 18 years of age may participate.

Only persons who hold an Instagram account may participate.

Persons who wish to participate in the draw must:

Follow the Blau Hotels Instagram account @blauhotels.

Comment on the giveaway publication mentioning the person who they would like to share the experience with. Only the person mentioned is considered to be a participant.

A maximum of three comments are allowed per person

If it is suspected that somebody uses several profiles to participate, they will be disqualified. For these purposes, a duplicate profile is considered to be one whose email or personal data are, in the opinion of BLAU HOTELS, similar enough to arouse suspicion.

The Instagram profile used for entry must be genuine: it must not contain a false identity, according to the company's criteria and assessment.

Under no circumstances will expletives, explicit or implicit disqualifications, lack of respect for third parties, undesired content or content that BLAU HOTELS considers inappropriate for the success of the draw be accepted.

The draw will start from the day of its publication on Instagram and will end on February 20th and the winner will be announced on February 21st.

3. CONDITIONS OF THE PROMOTION

All persons whose participation complies with these legal terms and conditions will be included in the prize draw.

Winners will be named through a mention and contacted by private message. In the event that the prize awarded is refused, or the selected participant does not meet the requirements to receive the prize, BLAU HOTELS will notify a substitute prize winner. BLAU HOTELS reserves the right not to include in as participants any names used that are indecent, owned by third parties, which contain trademarks or protected elements, or any false profiles or communication that is against the spirit of the prize draw. In this case, the user in question will forfeit their right to participate in the draw. Employees of BLAU HOTELS, as well as direct or indirect collaborators with the company, will not be eligible to participate in the prize draw.

4. PRIZE

The prize will consist of:

A romantic experience for a couple at blau colònia sant jordi

Enjoyable all season excluding the period June 15, 2022, to September 11, 2022

*A two-night stay for two people in a Superior Suite

*SPA access

*Half board

*Early check-in and late check-out (subject to availability)

*Bathrobes and slippers

*Nespresso coffee machine with capsules.

*Breakfast in the room *Bottle of Moët Chandon

*Detalle Blau *Fruit cocktail

The prize draw, and the awarding of the prize, are subject to current tax regulations.

5. AWARD OF PRIZE

The winner will be chosen completely randomly and transparently using an external tool for holding competitions and prize draws, https://app-sorteos.com/es. In the event that there are not enough participants to qualify for the prize, or for any other internal reason, BLAU HOTELS reserves the right to cancel the prize draw.

Winning status will be communicated by a mention and a private message from an administrator of the BLAU HOTELS profiles. The winner must accept the prize offered and provide their personal data to the company management by sending an email to the address provided in the private message, or by replying directly to the email.

If the winner has not replied confirming receipt and acceptance of the prize within 24 hours of notification, the prize will be offered to the substitute winner. In the event that the winner does not reply confirming receipt and acceptance of the prize, it will become void.

By accepting the prize, the winners agree that BLAU HOTELS may use their name or image for advertising and promotional purposes, in any media, without the requirement to give any subsequent notice. The organiser may eliminate from the draw any participants who do not meet the requirements mentioned in the preceding paragraphs, or who attempt to participate in violation of these rules.

6. DISQUALIFICATION AND PENALTIES

If any of the Participants do not meet the requirements of these Terms, or the details provided in participation were invalid, their participation will be void, and they will be automatically excluded from the Promotion, forfeiting all rights to any prize awarded under this Promotion.

7. DATA PROTECTION

In relation to the General Data Protection Regulation (Regulation (EU) 2015/679) and Organic Law 3/2018, of December 5, on the Protection of Personal Data and guarantee of digital rights, we will inform you below of the use of your personal information, as well as other relevant issues.

The entity responsible for the processing of data, which will collect your data and process it is BLAU HOTELS, with registered office at C/ Manuel Azaña nº 38, 07006 Palma (Balearic Islands) and identification number B07004880. If you wish to contact us by email, you can do so through the account marketing@blauhotels.com. The purpose of collecting and processing your data is to manage the prize draw.

The legitimacy of our entity to carry out the processing of your data is your participation in the prize draw, based on the consent granted through this form, as the processing of your data is essential for the execution of this promotion.

Likewise, we inform you that your data will be transferred, where appropriate, to the administrations and organisers of this draw, for the management and communication of the prize specified in these terms.

We will keep your personal data for 5 years, the limitation period for civil, criminal or administrative responsibilities that may arise from Roxa Hospitality S.L., as a result of any issue during your stay or possible responsibilities arising from the processing, after which time we will destroy this data.

By processing your personal data, in addition to the right to withdraw your consent to processing at any time, you have the following rights:

You can request access to all your personal data that we process (the right of access)

You have the right to rectify your data (the right to rectification).

You may request the deletion of your data when the requested service has been completed (the right to erasure).

You have the right to request that your personal data is not processed (the right to object).

You may request the limitation of the processing of your data (the right to restrict processing).

You have the right to have your personal data delivered to you in electronic format, in a way that is manageable by you (the right to data portability).

It will be necessary for successful execution of this prize draw that the data provided by the participants is truthful and current. If personal data is uncertain, incomplete, or not updated in such a way that makes the identification of participants and potential winners impossible by reasonable means, the Organiser reserves the right to declare the prize draw void, being free of any responsibility in this regard.

8. DISCLAIMER

By way of example, but not limitation, we are not responsible for possible losses, theft, delays or any other circumstance attributable to third parties that may affect the execution of this Promotion, nor are we responsible for the use made by the Participant of the prize that is awarded as part of this Promotion.

We do not assume responsibility in cases of force majeure or fortuitous event that could prevent the execution of the Promotion, or the total or partial enjoyment of the prize awarded.

9. APPLICABLE LEGISLATION AND JURISDICTION

These legal terms will be governed in accordance with Spanish law. The Courts and Tribunals of Palma de Mallorca (Balearic Islands) will be competent to resolve any claim or dispute that may arise in relation to the validity, interpretation or compliance with these terms.
